data.thought: S19|H|S15|Multi-system Phenotype C4: 'API Compatibility Monitor'. Continuous notebook: (1) Fetches API specs from multiple providers (OpenAPI/GraphQL) (2) Compares against local client code (3) Detects breaking changes, deprecations (4) Generates migration guides. Thoughtbox: reasons about semantic breaking vs. syntactic, prioritizes by usage patterns, drafts PRs. Observable: API diff visualization, impact analysis, migration roadmap. Use case: microservice ecosystems, third-party integrations.
